## Source: amazon-inspector (2f2ae2981daf16023f28b58d952a770dc6ec7060333721b5eeca90a6b05f6d56)

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2c9f2458dca53ba8ad76c5b58bb1e051d1ebced684c28a10a09af97d17941c29)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'eslint-config-pexip-engage' @ 1.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
